resources.string: La narración automática empezará cuando el móvil esté cerca a una colección expuesta en el museo.
Identifique las zonas de narración automática con este símbolo:
The mechanization of agriculture is generalized and the tractor is its main symbol.

With the economic liberation launched in the 1950s, Andalusian agriculture undergoes a major transformation: the marshes built in the Guadiana and Guadalquivir basins irrigate the lowland fields, allowing more profitable crops on the large estates. The salary increases provoked by the emigration provoke an accelerated mechanization during the first years of the decade of the 60.
Founding of the Democratic Student Unions
At the Universities of Granada and Seville

A student movement organised in the cladestine Democratic Student Unions at the Universities of Granada and Seville turnn the Adalusian universities into one of the few free places of the time. Many future Andalusian political leaders of the Democratic Transition were forged in its ranks and in those of the worker\'s movement.
Andalusia in the eye of the world

The Universal Exposition od Sevilla, the inauguration of the AVE high-speed train and the construction of the A-92 motorway symbolise Andalusia\'s new econonomic drive and its hugely enhanced infraestructure.
Creation and launch of several high-tech business parks
The represent Andalusia\'s entry into knowledge Society
